translation.en: [woman over radio] Attention all units, attention all units.
Probable domestic disturbance with hostage situation.
Perp is a Caucasian male, no known priors.
translation.fr:
Le suspect est un homme blanc,
sans antécédents,

translation.en: Considered extremely dangerous. Proceed with caution.
translation.fr:
considéré comme très dangereux.
Soyez prudents.

translation.en: [man 1 over radio] Unit 16. Suspect is Ray Hutchinson,

translation.fr:
Ray Hutchinson :
38 ans, 1,88 m, blanc, corpulence moyenne,
une ex-femme et deux enfants.

translation.en: [man 2 over radio] We've got three hostages, ex-wife and two kids.
translation.fr:
Trois otages :
l'ex-femme et les deux enfants.

translation.en: [woman] Suspect is wanted in connection with the murder of a police officer. He should be considered armed and dangerous.
translation.fr:
...lié au meurtre d'un policier.
Il est vraisemblablement armé.

translation.en: [Ray over phone] I'm not coming out, you hear me? I'm not coming out.
translation.fr:
Je sortirai pas, vous m'entendez ?
Je sortirai pas.

translation.en: I want everyone gone. You, your men, snipers, everyone.
translation.fr:
Dégagez tous d'ici,
vous, vos hommes, les snipers.

translation.en: If I don't see taillights in the next five minutes, you're not gonna like what happens next.
translation.fr:
Si vous avez pas décampé
dans cinq minutes, vous le regretterez.

translation.en: Can you get him back on the phone?
[commander over radio] Gold Unit, this is HR1. Move to green.
translation.fr:
Unité Gold, ici HR1 :
vous avez le feu vert.
Je l'ai dans le viseur, chef. Non, Ben, il est pas armé.
Non, Ben, il est pas armé.

translation.en: I didn't want it to end like this.
translation.fr: Je voulais pas en arriver là.

translation.en: It's not supposed to end like this.
Put your son down and step away.
[pilot] Command, this is Navy Alpha two-one-niner en route to Beaufort Naval Hospital.
translation.fr:
Ici AB Alpha 219, en route
pour l'hôpital de la marine de Beaufort.

translation.en: [woman over PA] Dr. McCullen, Surgery, please.
[newsman] From the Great Pyramid of Giza to the Tower of Babel,
translation.fr:
De la grande pyramide de Gizeh
à la tour de Babel,

translation.en: brick by brick and stone by stone,
translation.fr:
brique après brique
et pierre après pierre,

translation.en: by one singular desire, to touch the sky.
translation.fr:
par un désir sans égal :
celui d'atteindre le ciel.

translation.en: [newsman 2] The brainchild of former tech magnate, Zhao Long Ji.
translation.fr:
Imaginé par l'ex-géant des technologies
Zhao Long Zhi...

translation.en: [newsman] Who has spared no expense creating this city in the sky,
translation.fr:
...dépensant sans compter
pour créer cette ville dans le ciel,

translation.en: going so far as to build
a 30-story vertical park at the building's center.
translation.fr:
haut de 30 étages,
au centre de la tour.

translation.en: The Pearl speaks to what we can achieve when we don't accept limitations.
translation.fr: The Pearl illustre le refus des limites.
Ce n'est pas un immeuble de plus.
Le plus haut édifice du monde...

translation.en: [newsman] This high-tech high-rise generates  all of its energy needs
translation.fr:
La tour high-tech produit
sa propre énergie

translation.en: from a massive double helix wind turbine near its top.
translation.fr: via des éoliennes géantes situées au sommet.

translation.en: [newswoman] Dwarfing the Burj Khalifa and tripling the height
translation.fr:
Éclipsant le Burj Khalifa et trois fois plus haut
que l'Empire State...

translation.en: of the venerable Empire State Building.
translation.fr:
et trois fois plus haut
que l'Empire State... ...s'élevant à plus de 900 m.

translation.en: [newswoman] The Pearl's lower half has delighted the public
translation.fr:
Sa partie basse séduit le public
depuis six mois.

translation.en: [newsman 4] Its residential upper half has yet to open its doors.

translation.fr: Leur qualité... profite à la ville...

translation.en: [newswoman 2] But it's the mysterious sphere that has the world buzzing.
translation.fr:
La Sphère mystérieuse
attise les rumeurs.
Dans un communiqué paru ce jour,

translation.en: the secretive billionaire confirmed that despite rumors
of an inability to fully insure
plans to open the building's upper half remain on track.
translation.fr:
L'ouverture de la partie haute
reste d'actualité.

translation.en: [newswoman 3] He promises that the sphere will be
the number one tourist attraction in the world,
translation.fr: ...promettant que la Sphère deviendra la 1re attraction touristique du monde...

translation.en: The screens go off, shoes go on. It's panda time.
translation.fr:
On éteint tout, chaussures
et à nous les pandas.

translation.en: Where's your dad? I need him to fix my phone before we go.
translation.fr:
Où est votre père ?
J'ai un souci de portable.

translation.en: Ah, screw it. I'm just gonna high-five the guy.
translation.fr: On oublie, je lui ferai un check.

translation.en: -Yeah, just some leg stuff, you know. -Mmm.
translation.fr: Ma jambe me travaille un peu.

translation.en: Does it look like I'm trying too hard?
No, but you should learn to tie one. Come here.
translation.fr: Non, mais apprends à la nouer.

translation.en: I can hear your gears turning.
I just don't want to screw it up, you know.
You're not gonna screw it up.
I don't know. What if I missed something?
Baby, there's no way you've missed something.
translation.fr: Chéri, aucun détail ne t'a échappé.

translation.en: You've been preparing for this meeting for six months. I've never seen you work harder on anything.
translation.fr:
Six mois que tu t'y prépares,
je t'ai jamais vu travailler si dur.

translation.en: You're ready for this. You know this place better than the architect.
translation.fr:
Tu maîtrises,
mieux que l'architecte lui-même.

translation.en: They flew you out here for a reason. They want to hear what you have to say.
translation.fr:
S'ils t'ont fait venir,
ils vont t'écouter.

translation.en: Ben stuck his neck out for me and then, you know,
this could be a real game-changer for us.
translation.fr: et ça pourrait changer notre vie.

translation.en: They give stuff like this to big companies. I work out of our garage.
translation.fr:
Grosse mission
pour un mec qui bosse de son garage.

translation.en: Okay, look, just because you're a smaller company does not mean that you don't belong
translation.fr:
La taille de ta boîte
n'enlève rien à tes compétences.

translation.en: and, for the record, Ben stuck his neck out for you because he's your friend
translation.fr:
Et pour info,
Ben s'est mouillé par amitié.

translation.en: Hey. Look at me. Look at me.
"Hey, look at me, you've got this, you look so handsome,"
just a way of buttering me up to fix your phone again?
translation.fr:
c'était de la pommade
pour que je le répare ?

translation.en: All right, well, what do I tell you to do any time something's wrong with your phone?
Try turning it off and on again. [Will] Try turning it off and on again.
translation.fr:
- L'éteindre et le rallumer.
- C'est ça.

translation.en: you can fix a problem by turning it off and on again.
translation.fr:
on résout le problème
en éteignant et rallumant.

translation.en: So, did you, uh, try turning it off and on again?
Nope. I like it better when you do it. It gives you a sense of accomplishment.
translation.fr:
Non, je te laisse le faire,
ça te valorise.

translation.en: Oh, I see. So you're asking me to fix your phone for me?
translation.fr:
Tu me demandes de réparer ton portable
pour mon bien ?

translation.en: Put your coats in your bags.
[Will] All right, kids. You guys are gonna go see pandas.
translation.fr: Vous, vous allez voir les pandas

translation.en: -[Sarah gasps] Pandas. -Daddy's gonna go make that bacon.
translation.fr: et papa va décrocher le jackpot.

translation.en: -[children laugh] -Let me ask you a question.
-Can't hear you. Can't hear you. -[both] Me! Me! -Confidence. Not confident. -Me! Me!
Okay, okay, you know what? You're both right.

translation.fr: Vous avez tout juste, papa vous aime tous les deux.

translation.en: [Sarah] I got to get a chant.

translation.fr:
- Tu l'as réparé ?
- Comme d'hab. Tu m'aimes vraiment.

translation.en: Mmm, thank you. It's so good to see you.
You're kidding me. These are the twins?
They're so big now. What are you guys up to?
translation.fr:
Comme ils ont grandi. - Vous allez où ?
- Voir les pandas.

translation.en: -We're going to see the pandas. -I heard.
translation.fr:
- Vous allez où ?
- Voir les pandas. On m'a dit ça.

translation.en: This'll get you in to see the nighttime panda feeding.
translation.fr:
Avec ceci,
vous pourrez assister à leur dîner,

translation.en: -Thank you. -But I know a lot of pandas, so.
translation.fr: Merci. Mais je connais plein de pandas.

translation.en: Some gear, just to look the part.
-[Sarah] What do you guys say? -[both] Thank you.
Get out of here, go have fun. I'll see you tonight, honey.
translation.fr: Filez vous amuser. À ce soir.

translation.en: Hey, look. Thanks for putting in a good word. I know my company's small
translation.fr:
Merci de ton appui,
je sais, je pèse pas lourd

translation.en: They're dying to open the upper half.
translation.fr: Ils ont hâte d'ouvrir le haut

translation.en: And they needed somebody to check the math on their safety and security systems.
translation.fr:
et ça demande
un audit des systèmes de sécurité.

translation.en: Plus, you were cheaper than anyone else.
translation.fr: En plus, t'étais le moins cher.
Tout dans la sobriété. Oui, du titane massif.

translation.en: Nothing says, "Welcome to my penthouse panic room" like 10 inches of military-grade super alloy.
translation.fr:
Pas plus discret pour une chambre forte
que 25 cm de superalliage.

translation.en: I mean... [exhales] I guess if you got to live somewhere...
It's a pleasure to finally meet you.
Thank God. My wife only taught me one phrase.
translation.fr:
Tant mieux, ma femme
ne m'a appris qu'une phrase.

translation.en: Sarah, right? She's a Naval surgeon, isn't she?
translation.fr: Sarah, c'est ça ? Elle est chirurgienne militaire ?

translation.en: She is. She also minored in language
translation.fr: Oui, et a étudié les langues
et la civilisation de l'Asie de l'Est.

translation.en: -at Annapolis. -And your twins, Henry and Georgia.
translation.fr: Et vos jumeaux, Henry et Georgia ?

translation.en: You are the very first family
translation.fr: Vous êtes les premiers à séjourner

translation.en: we have had in the residential section of The Pearl.
translation.fr:
dans la partie résidentielle
de The Pearl,

translation.en: I thought it might be a good test for us.
It's their first visit to Hong Kong.
translation.fr: C'est leur 1er séjour à Hong Kong.

translation.en: Allow me to introduce my head of personal security,
translation.fr:
Les voilà. Je vous présente le chef de ma sécurité personnelle
Ajani Okeke

le chef de ma sécurité personnelle
Ajani Okeke

et M. Pierce
des assurances Hawthorne-Stone.

translation.en: -Very nice to meet you, Mr. Sawyer. -Likewise.
After your independent third-party assessment is approved,
translation.fr: La validation de votre évaluation externe

translation.en: they will confirm full coverage of The Pearl,
will carry the most expensive premium
translation.fr:
qui comprend la prime
la plus importante

translation.en: for a single structure in underwriting history.
translation.fr:
jamais contractée
pour un édifice aussi singulier.

La sécurité incendie utilise des clapets
coupe-feu uniques,

translation.en: employ a one-of-a-kind self-sealing ventilation system
and a robust sprinkler and CO2 array
translation.fr: des sprinklers puissants, et des diffuseurs de CO2

translation.en: which can put out a fire in a fraction of the time.
translation.fr:
aptes à étouffer un feu
en un clin d'œil,

translation.en: All monitored by a control facility located over a mile away.
translation.fr:
le tout surveillé d'un centre de contrôle
situé à plus de deux kilomètres.

translation.en: You hired me to assess your safety and security systems
translation.fr:
Vous m'avez confié cet audit
et après une analyse complète,

translation.en: and after a complete analysis, I can say that it's the safest
translation.fr:
cet audit
et après une analyse complète, je confirme : c'est le gratte-ciel
le plus sûr au monde.

je confirme : c'est le gratte-ciel
le plus sûr au monde.

translation.en: It's Fort Knox, a mile in the sky.
translation.fr: C'est Fort Knox perché à un kilomètre.

translation.en: Once I inspect the security at the off-site facility,
translation.fr:
Quand j'aurai inspecté
le centre de contrôle,

translation.en: and you can open the residential upper half.
translation.fr:
et vous pourrez ouvrir
la partie résidentielle.

translation.en: You were the right man for the job.
This tablet will give you administrative access
translation.fr:
Cette tablette vous donnera
un accès administrateur

translation.en: to The Pearl's fire and safety control measures.
translation.fr:
aux dispositifs de sécurité
de The Pearl.

translation.en: Once linked to your biometric data,
translation.fr:
Une fois associée
à vos données biométriques,

translation.en: you'll be the only one who can access it.
Ben will take you to our off-site facility
translation.fr:
Ben vous conduira
au centre de contrôle,

translation.en: so you can make sure everything checks out.
translation.fr:
pour vous assurer
que tout est opérationnel.

translation.en: [Zhao] If we hurry, there's still time.
translation.fr: Si on se dépêche, on a le temps.
Ça, c'est le joyau de The Pearl.

translation.en: Three hundred and seventeen motion-sensitive projection panels
make this sphere the eighth wonder of the world.
translation.fr:
font de la Sphère
la 8e merveille du monde.

translation.en: The sphere is comprised of nearly 25,000 ultra high-definition panels
translation.fr:
Cette Sphère est composée
de 25 000 écrans ultrahaute définition

translation.en: with embedded 8K micro cameras on both sides.
translation.fr:
avec caméra 8K intégrée
sur chaque face.
C'est pas vrai ! "Bienvenue au paradis", sans rire ?

translation.en: -But, like, cool or creepy? -Uh, little of both.
translation.fr: Genre, cool ou flippant ? Un peu les deux.

translation.en: Yeah, but things are a lot different now. I got a wife and kids,
translation.fr: mais ma vie a changé. J'ai une femme, des enfants.

translation.en: and I haven't touched a gun in 10 years.
translation.fr: Dix ans sans toucher une arme.

translation.en: I just kind of put my sword down, you know?
and I'm just never gonna pick it up again.
You know, he was wearing a vest. There's no way you could've known that.
translation.fr:
Il portait un gilet explosif,
tu pouvais pas savoir.
C'est un coup du sort, rien d'autre.

translation.en: You know, the funny thing is, without that bad luck, I, uh...
translation.fr:
Le plus drôle,
c'est que sans ce coup du sort,

translation.en: I never would've had my kids.
I don't know who I'd be without my family.
translation.fr:
Je sais pas où j'en serais sans eux.
Je serais...

translation.en: Come on, man, I'm sorry. I didn't mean it like that. Come on.
translation.fr:
Pardon, c'est pas du tout
ce que je voulais dire.

translation.en: [Will] The kids are really excited about the nighttime feeding.
[Ben] Yeah, it's a blast. They'll be there all night.
translation.fr:
C'est sympa,
ça occupera leur soirée.

translation.en: -Thanks for taking me to the off-site. -No worries.
I mean, dinner's on you, of course.
You're gonna need some stitches for that, though, man. That's a nasty cut, bro.
translation.fr: Il te faudra des points de suture.

translation.en: Yeah, I put it in my jacket before we left.
-How's that for luck, huh? -Yeah, man. Nice one.
translation.fr: Imagine la chance. Oui, bien joué.

translation.en: Thought we were both gonna get fired for that.
translation.fr: On aurait été virés tous les deux.

translation.en: Well, we didn't really get to see them
translation.fr: On les a pas vraiment vus,

translation.en: because Henry ate a weird candy and started throwing up,
translation.fr:
Henry a mangé un drôle de bonbon,
il a vomi

translation.en: Is he okay? Did he have an attack?
translation.fr: Il va bien ? Il a fait une crise ?
Les boules. Pas de gros mots.

translation.en: I'll take you there tomorrow, okay, if you're feeling better.
translation.fr: On ira demain, si tu te sens mieux.

translation.en: Building maintenance. We thought this floor was empty.
translation.fr:
Maintenance de l'immeuble.
On se croyait seuls.
Nous aussi. Tout va bien ? Tout va au mieux.

translation.en: We're just checking the phone lines.
I didn't know they were active yet.
Well, they will be when we finish with them.
Well, look at this precious little pair.
You got the run of the castle on this floor.
Not too bad for a big strong knight
translation.fr: Plutôt pas mal pour un vaillant chevalier

translation.en: They were supposed to be gone.
-I know. -Want me to clean that up?
-What's up? Where you going? -I got to go.
translation.fr:
Où tu vas ? Je file. Henry se sent mal,
ils sont rentrés à The Pearl.

translation.en: Henry's not feeling well. They went back to The Pearl.
translation.fr:
Je file. Henry se sent mal,
ils sont rentrés à The Pearl.
Ils sont rentrés à The Pearl ?

translation.en: All right. I'll call you tonight. What a day, huh?
translation.fr:
Je t'appelle ce soir.
Quelle journée.

translation.en: You're not gonna make it in time.
Why'd you take it out of the bag?
You should've just left it in the bag.
translation.fr: Fallait la laisser dans ton sac.

translation.en: Ben, what are you talking about?
You screw up, you get a whole new life.
translation.fr:
Tu merdes, tu décroches une nouvelle vie.
Et moi ?

translation.en: What do I get? Hmm? Medical discharge?
translation.fr:
tu décroches une nouvelle vie.
Et moi ? Inaptitude au travail.

translation.en: You don't know these people, Will. I don't have a choice,
translation.fr:
Tu les connais pas,
j'ai pas le choix.

translation.en: but you don't want to do this. We're not brothers.
translation.fr:
- Mais fais pas ça.
- T'es pas mon frère.

translation.en: Let's get you up. Come on, let's go. Sit up. There we go.
translation.fr: On se relève, allez. Comme ça.

translation.en: Hold this here. Hold it tight.
I need you to tell me what happened, okay?
translation.fr: et dis-moi ce qui se passe.

translation.en: All right? I can help you if you tell me what happened.
translation.fr: Je peux t'aider si tu m'expliques.

translation.en: They weren't supposed to go back, Will.
translation.fr: Ils auraient pas dû être là,

translation.en: They weren't supposed to be there.
Who wasn't supposed to be there?
Light a man's house on fire
translation.fr: Si on met le feu à sa maison,

translation.en: and you find out what he truly loves.
translation.fr: on saura ce qu'il aime le plus.

translation.en: -Mom? What's going on? -[alarm wailing in distance]
I don't know. Let me go check.
translation.fr: Je sais pas, je vais voir.

translation.en: The building isn't on fire. The 96th floor is on fire.
translation.fr:
L'immeuble n'est pas en feu,
le 96e étage est en feu.

translation.en: We're more than a hundred stories above that,
translation.fr: On se trouve 100 étages plus haut

translation.en: and the anti-fire measures will keep it there.
translation.fr: et le système de sécurité le confinera.

translation.en: We're perfectly safe here, I assure you.
translation.fr: On est hors de danger, je vous assure.

translation.en: They're coming, Will. They're gonna kill you.
translation.fr: Ils sont en route. Ils vont te tuer.

translation.en: We're evacuating the floors below the fire line.
translation.fr:
On évacue tous les étages inférieurs,
ceux situés en dessous du feu.

translation.en: What about the people above the 96th?
The owner is in the penthouse on the 220th.
But the fire will never get there.
translation.fr: mais le feu n'y arrivera pas.
La sécurité incendie a été activée.

translation.en: What about the people on other floors?
translation.fr: Et les gens aux autres étages ?

translation.en: There's no one else above the 96th.
translation.fr:
Il n'y a personne d'autre
au-delà du 96e.

translation.en: -Come here, bud. -I'm fine, Mom. I don't need it.
You're fine now, honey, but we're about to go out there,
translation.fr:
Pour le moment, ça va, mais on va sortir
et il y aura beaucoup de fumée.

translation.en: and there's a lot of smoke and a lot of bad air,
translation.fr:
mais on va sortir
et il y aura beaucoup de fumée.

translation.en: and we don't want you to have an attack, okay?
translation.fr: Je voudrais pas que t'aies une crise.

translation.en: Georgia, dunk them all the way. Make sure they get completely wet, -the hand towels, too. -Okay.
translation.fr:
Georgia, mouille-les bien.
Les petites aussi.

translation.en: Baby, we are not gonna die. We are gonna be just fine.
translation.fr: Non, ma puce, on va pas mourir, tout ira bien.

translation.en: [Xia over radio] We're in position at the off-site control facility.
translation.fr: En position, au centre de contrôle.

translation.en: There you are. Baby, there's a fire in the building.
translation.fr:
Te voilà. - Chéri, un feu s'est déclaré.
- Je sais.

translation.en: I know. All right, look, I can't get to you. The police have the entire building locked down.
translation.fr:
Je peux pas vous rejoindre,
la police verrouille les lieux.

translation.en: I want you to get out of there right now.
Go inside the hallway, there should be a logistics panel.
If you show it to me, I can tell you where it's safe to go.
Take the kids with you. I'm gonna stay on the phone.
translation.fr: Prends les enfants, je bouge pas.

translation.en: Hand me those towels. Come on.
translation.fr:
Donne-moi les serviettes.
Allez, ma puce.

translation.en: Will Sawyer's family unlocked their apartment door an hour ago.
translation.fr:
Les Sawyer ont ouvert leur porte
il y a une heure.

translation.en: They're in the building. Send two men.
Use the manual override code on the elevators.
translation.fr:
Envoyez deux hommes,
forcez manuellement les ascenseurs,

translation.en: [Mr. Pierce] What? Listen, the fire isn't just gonna go out.
translation.fr: Quoi ? Le feu ne veut pas s'éteindre.

translation.en: I can only access nominal control.
I can't lock out the on-site functions without the...
The entire system has been compromised.
What do you mean, you're locked out? I thought that couldn't happen.
[Xia over radio] We have full control of the anti-fire systems.
translation.fr:
On contrôle totalement
le système anti-incendie.

translation.en: Seal all the fire doors from 95 to the ground.
translation.fr: Bloquez les portes coupe-feu jusqu'au 95e étage.

translation.en: And disable all anti-fire measures from 96 to the top.
translation.fr:
Désactivez tous les dispositifs
anti-incendie du 96e au sommet.

translation.en: [Will over phone] Everything's gonna be okay.
The logistics panel should be to your left.
translation.fr:
Le panneau de contrôle
doit être à gauche.

translation.en: All the floors above us are yellow.
translation.fr: Tout le haut est en jaune. Pourquoi ?

translation.en: -What does that mean? -It means the entire fire system
translation.fr: Tout le haut est en jaune. Pourquoi ? La sécurité incendie est déconnectée.

translation.en: Sarah, listen to me. The fire is not gonna stop.
I want you to get out of there right now and go up.
Go up, keep going up, don't stop, don't look back.
translation.fr: sans vous arrêter ni vous retourner.

translation.en: [Botha over radio] Now force the fire up.
translation.fr: Poussez le feu vers le haut.

translation.en: Open the elevator shaft air vents
and feed it with fresh oxygen.
[coughs] Mrs. Sawyer? We're with the building security.
No one could survive that. They're gone.
translation.fr:
Aucune chance de survie,
ils sont morts.

translation.en: [Botha] We're moving into position. You know what to do next.
translation.fr:
On avance.
Tu connais les instructions.

translation.en: -[Sarah] Go, hurry, up the stairs. -[Will] Sarah.
My family's inside. Listen to me.
I have to get to them.
So, you have full systems control from the tablet.
All other access points to The Pearl mainframe have been encrypted.
translation.fr:
Tous les autres points d'accès
au serveur ont été cryptés.

translation.en: The entire building now, it's locked out.
I used my own logarithmic base cipher to encrypt it,
so I am literally the only human on the planet Earth that can crack this.
translation.fr:
je suis le seul sur Terre
à pouvoir le cracker.

translation.en: [Ajani] If the fire continues to climb,
translation.fr: Si le feu continue de monter,

translation.en: it will superheat the air around the helipad, making liftoff impossible.
translation.fr:
l'air sera trop chaud
pour un décollage en hélicoptère.

translation.en: Our departure window is closing, sir.
translation.fr: Notre créneau de départ se resserre.

translation.en: I hate to say it, but it is now or never. [automated voice] Warning. Anti-fire measures offline.
translation.fr:
Désolé
mais c'est maintenant ou jamais.

translation.en: Happy? You got to play the hero,
translation.fr:
Satisfait ? Votre lubie d'héroïsme a échoué,
il faut partir.

translation.en: it didn't work, it's time to go.
translation.fr:
Votre lubie d'héroïsme a échoué,
il faut partir.

translation.en: [Zhao] All right, Mr. Pierce. You'll get your wish.
translation.fr:
Très bien, M. Pierce,
comme il vous plaira.

translation.en: [in Cantonese] What do we know about Sawyer?
FBI for six years, Hostage Rescue for eight.
translation.fr:
Six ans au FBI, huit ans
dans l'unité de libération d'otages.

translation.en: She's a combat surgeon. Three tours Afghanistan.
translation.fr:
Elle est chirurgienne militaire,
trois missions en Afghanistan.

translation.en: Don't have a location on them yet.
translation.fr: On ne les a pas encore localisés.

translation.en: Will Sawyer was hired as a safety assessor.
translation.fr:
Will Sawyer a été engagé
comme expert en sécurité. Il a eu accès
aux protocoles sécurisés.

translation.en: He had access to the security protocols.
translation.fr:
Il a eu accès
aux protocoles sécurisés.

translation.en: Maybe he shut down the anti-fire measures.
translation.fr:
Il a pu désactiver
les dispositifs anti-incendie.

translation.en: Do me a favor, go find Will Sawyer.
I'd like to ask him some questions.
I want to talk to him. [in English] Yes, sir.
What the hell is he doing?
He's climbing above the fire line.
translation.fr: Il dépasse le niveau du feu.

translation.en: Sir, I can't protect you if you don't tell me what's going on.
translation.fr:
Monsieur, je ne peux pas vous protéger
si vous ne me dites rien.

translation.en: This isn't just a fire. It's a plot.
translation.fr:
Le feu n'est pas accidentel,
c'est délibéré.

translation.en: -I can't say for sure. -I don't need facts.
translation.fr:
Je ne peux rien affirmer. Même sans certitude,
que dit votre intuition ?

translation.en: What is your gut telling you? Who's behind this?
translation.fr:
Même sans certitude,
que dit votre intuition ? Qui est derrière tout ça ?

translation.en: If a man like Botha wanted you dead, there are easier ways.
translation.fr: Si Botha voulait vous tuer, il y a des moyens plus simples.

translation.en: [scoffs] He doesn't want me dead. At least not yet.
translation.fr: il y a des moyens plus simples. Il ne veut pas me tuer, pas tout de suite.

translation.en: And lighting The Pearl on fire is the only way he can get it.
translation.fr:
et il ne l'obtiendra
qu'en incendiant The Pearl.

translation.en: Is there something I should know?

translation.fr: Il essaie d'entrer dans la tour.
Haut les mains ! Ne tirez pas.

translation.en: [in Cantonese] Why would anyone want to get into a burning building?
translation.fr:
Qui voudrait pénétrer
dans un immeuble en feu ?

translation.en: [in Cantonese] Inspector... We have a last known location
translation.fr:
Inspecteur, on a localisé
la famille de Will Sawyer.

on a localisé
la famille de Will Sawyer.

translation.en: You're doing great. Wait, hold on. Come here.
-Baby, we're gonna wet these again, okay? -Okay, Mommy.
translation.fr: On va les mouiller à nouveau.

translation.en: Okay, baby. Calm down. Calm down.
That's the bridge to the waterfall. We'll keep heading up.
translation.fr:
Ça mène à la cascade,
on continue de monter.

translation.en: Come on. Up the stairs. Okay.

translation.fr: Ce n'est pas notre pilote. Botha.

translation.en: I see you met my associate.
Why don't you just shoot me and take it?

translation.fr: Tu me prends pour un con ?

translation.en: You know I can't do that.
'Cause the men I work for will kill me
translation.fr:
Ceux qui m'emploient me tueront
si je leur rapporte pas.

translation.en: if I don't get it back for them.
translation.fr:
me tueront
si je leur rapporte pas.

translation.en: You should've paid me and been done with it. But no.
translation.fr:
Suffisait de payer et c'était réglé,
mais non,

translation.en: Clever boys like you always think you can be clever.
translation.fr:
un petit malin comme toi
se croit toujours plus malin.

translation.en: I'm gonna take you and your drive
translation.fr:
je vais te forcer à me suivre,
avec ton disque

translation.en: And I'm going to make you watch as your building burns to ash
translation.fr: et à regarder ta tour partir en fumée

translation.en: and there's nothing you can do about it.
He sealed himself in the penthouse. Open the doors.
translation.fr:
Il s'est enfermé dans le penthouse.
Ouvre les portes.

translation.en: The penthouse floor has its own subroutine.
translation.fr:
Le penthouse
a son propre système de contrôle.

translation.en: Zhao must have isolated that system.
translation.fr: Zhao a dû l'isoler du reste.

translation.en: I can't open the doors with this tablet.
translation.fr: Je ne peux pas ouvrir les portes.

translation.en: Wait. It looks like Will Sawyer's in the building.
translation.fr: Un instant. Will Sawyer est dans l'immeuble

translation.en: And I've got a movement alert.
You're not gonna get in using force.
translation.fr: Vous n'entrerez pas par la force.

translation.en: You need someone who knows the system.
translation.fr: Il nous faut un expert du système

translation.en: And I know just the man for the job.
translation.fr: et je connais l'homme de la situation.

translation.en: If anyone can get in, it's him.
translation.fr: Si quelqu'un peut entrer, c'est lui.

translation.en: He's in the building. Just need to find him.
translation.fr: Il est ici, il nous reste à le trouver.

translation.en: We don't need to find him.
If you can't fix it with duct tape...
translation.fr: Si du chatterton fait pas l'affaire,

translation.en: Then you ain't using enough duct tape.
All right, you were on the 98th floor, east side stairwell.
translation.fr: On était au 98e étage, escalier est.

translation.en: Means you would've had to go through the park.
translation.fr: Vous avez dû traverser le parc.

translation.en: -Stay with me, baby. Okay? Okay. -[Henry coughing]
I got them. They're in the park.
-[gasps] -Come on. -Kids, too. -[Sarah] Do what he says. Okay?
translation.fr:
- Par ici, vous deux.
- Faites ce qu'il dit.

translation.en: That's right. Listen to your mummy.
[Sarah] It's okay, guys. Everything's gonna be okay.
translation.fr: C'est bon, les enfants. Ça va aller.

translation.en: Just do exactly what I say.
Just have to go up a little bit farther.
Keep going. Go all the way up to the waterfall.
I'll go around to the other side.
[Mr. Pierce] I'm not supposed to kill you,
but I think your kids will be enough.

translation.fr:
- Ça va ?
- Oui, je vais bien.

translation.en: How did you get in the building?
It's a long story. Where are the kids?
-Mom! Dad! -[Sarah] Oh, God, are you okay?

translation.fr:
- Reste où tu es.
- Et ta sœur ?

translation.en: She's at the top of the park by the waterfall.
translation.fr: Elle est tout en haut, à la cascade.

translation.en: Honey, stay right there. -Daddy's coming for you. -Okay.
translation.fr: Ma puce, bouge pas. Papa va venir.

translation.en: -How do we get across the bridge? -[coughing]
-All right, we got to do this together. -Okay.
When I tell you to, walk it out, drop it, and go get him, okay?
translation.fr:
À mon top,
tu la bascules et tu traverses.

translation.en: I'm gonna hold the bridge steady.
Oh, I got you. I got you.
-Okay. As still as you can. -[board creaking]
[straining] You can do it. You can do it.
I can't hold it anymore! Jump!
Come on. Will, what the hell is going on?
I don't know, but I got to get you guys out of this building. -Henry can't breathe. -I know.
translation.fr:
J'en sais rien mais faut sortir d'ici,
Henry étouffe.

translation.en: All right, these elevators operate on electromagnetic induction.
translation.fr:
Ce sont des ascenseurs
à induction électromagnétique.

translation.en: they're held in place by a fail-safe brake.
translation.fr: un frein les maintient en place.

translation.en: When I cut this cable, you're gonna fall.
translation.fr: Je coupe ça et vous chutez.

translation.en: Just listen to me. You're gonna fall through the fire.
translation.fr: Écoute, vous allez traverser le feu.

translation.en: The magnets are gonna kick back on once you pass the fire line.
translation.fr:
Le dispositif se réactivera
de l'autre côté.

translation.en: But I need you to pull this handle in order to engage the braking system.
translation.fr:
Avec cette manette,
tu actionneras le freinage.

translation.en: It's about 500 feet from here until the fire line.
translation.fr:
Il y a environ 150 m
avant de sortir du feu.

translation.en: I want you to count to five and pull the handle.
In order to be brave, we got to be a little scared.
translation.fr:
Dans le courage,
il y a une dose de peur.

translation.en: All right? Now, I need you to be brave right now.
I want you to hold on to your mom.
Okay, baby. We're gonna sit down.
We're gonna brace ourselves, all right?

translation.fr: Tu crains rien. Viens avec nous.

translation.en: Just the man I was looking for.
I hear your dad knows everything about this building.
translation.fr:
ton père serait incollable
sur cette tour.

translation.en: what my business partner is holding behind those doors.
translation.fr: Une seule chose m'intéresse, ce que mon associé cache là-derrière,

translation.en: And you're going to get it for me.
translation.fr: et tu vas me le rapporter.

translation.en: The only way those doors open is from the inside,
translation.fr: ça ne s'ouvre que de l'intérieur

translation.en: or the fire alarm on this floor triggers it,
but that can't happen because you took the entire system offline.
translation.fr: mais vous avez neutralisé le système.

translation.en: [Botha] Is that so? Well, let me tell you something.
translation.fr:
C'est bien sûr ?
Je vais t'expliquer :

translation.en: Once you know what he loves, you have it.
translation.fr: il suffit de savoir ce qu'il aime.

translation.en: So now we're going to find out how much you love your family, Will.
translation.fr: Maintenant, on va voir à quel point tu aimes ta famille, Will.

translation.en: Listen to me. Opening those doors from this floor can't be done.
translation.fr:
Écoutez, on ne peut pas
ouvrir les portes d'ici.

translation.en: You're gonna bring Zhao and what he's holding behind those doors to me.
translation.fr:
tu vas aller me chercher Zhao
et ce qu'il cache là-derrière

translation.en: Or I'm gonna throw your daughter off the fucking roof.
translation.fr: ou je balance ta fille du toit.

translation.en: I hear it's like heaven up there.
We're not gonna wait around here to burn.
We're getting reports of activity on the ground floor of the building.
translation.fr:
Une présence aurait été détectée
au rez-de-chaussée de l'immeuble.

translation.en: We're going to go live to Kowloon Plaza, where we may have some survivors
translation.fr:
Nous allons en direct sur place
où des survivants

translation.en: It's difficult to imagine how anyone could have survived
translation.fr:
On imagine mal que quiconque
ait pu survivre à l'incendie

translation.en: the raging fire on the upper floors.
[Henry] My dad's inside. He saved us.
[newsman] It appears this may be the family of William Sawyer,
translation.fr: Ce serait la famille de Will Sawyer,

translation.en: There's got to be a way to open these doors.
Where did you put the subroutine panels that controls them?
translation.fr: Où as-tu mis le panneau de contrôle ?

translation.en: Where did you hide it, Zhao?
How did you get out of the building?
[Sergeant Han] And you claim your husband isn't involved?
translation.fr: Vous niez l'implication de votre mari ?

translation.en: It's not a claim. He's not involved.
translation.fr: Je ne nie rien, c'est la vérité.

translation.en: How many of them did you say you saw?
One in a suit, two others in coveralls.
translation.fr: Un en costume, deux en combinaison.

translation.en: The one that I spoke to, he had an accent.
translation.fr: Celui qui a parlé avait un accent...

translation.en: There. Top row. Second from the right.
translation.fr: La rangée du haut, le 2e depuis la droite.

translation.en: Is this the man you saw?
Has a nasty crew with him, too.
High-end muscle for three different crime syndicates.
translation.fr:
C'est le molosse de choix
de trois triades.

translation.en: This doesn't pass the smell test.
Why would he trap himself in the fire?
translation.fr:
Pourquoi se laisser
volontairement piéger par le feu

translation.en: And why would he cut off his only way out?
translation.fr: et éliminer son seul billet de sortie ?

translation.en: One of them was carrying a container,
translation.fr:
Le 2e homme transportait une caisse
marquée d'un logo avec des ailes

translation.en: and it had a logo with wings on it, and the word "Sirin."
translation.fr:
Le 2e homme transportait une caisse
marquée d'un logo avec des ailes et le nom Sirin.

translation.en: A BASE jump from 1,000 meters up gives you roughly
translation.fr:
Un saut en parachute de 1 000 m
permet en gros
de couvrir deux kilomètres au sol.

translation.en: they will land somewhere within this circle.

translation.fr: Un endroit dégagé, plat et isolé.

translation.en: Now, they wouldn't go for Victoria Park. There's too many trees to get hung up on.
translation.fr:
Pas Victoria Park, trop d'arbres
dans lesquels rester pendu.

translation.en: South, they wouldn't clear the peak.
translation.fr: Au sud, le pic Victoria les bloque.

translation.en: but it's a longer haul to an open spot.
translation.fr: mais ça veut dire plus loin.

translation.en: That's nothing. It's a construction site.
You can't seriously be considering this.
For all we know, she could be in on it.
translation.fr:
Autant qu'on sache,
elle pourrait être de mèche.

translation.en: You think I would willingly trap my own children in a burning building?
translation.fr:
Je piégerais mes enfants
dans un incendie ?

translation.en: [in English] I think you could be playing a role.
This could all be part of your husband's plan.
translation.fr: Tout a pu être planifié par votre mari.

translation.en: If I am wrong and it's empty, then what have you lost?
translation.fr:
Si j'ai tort,
qu'est-ce que vous perdez ?

translation.en: But if I am right, this might be your only chance
translation.fr:
Mais si j'ai raison, ce pourrait être l'unique chance
d'arrêter les coupables.

translation.en: to catch the people responsible for this whole thing.
translation.fr:
ce pourrait être l'unique chance
d'arrêter les coupables.
Ma famille est dans cette tour.

translation.en: Just cut the wire, doors will open, climb back up there.
translation.fr:
Tu coupes le fil, les portes s'ouvrent,
tu remontes.

translation.en: Does that look like someone with a plan to you?
translation.fr: Il aurait planifié ça, selon vous ?

translation.en: All right, if we're gonna get out of here, you're gonna have to tell me the truth.
translation.fr:
Si on veut s'en sortir,
il faut me dire la vérité.

translation.en: How does a man like that call you his business partner?
translation.fr:
Pourquoi cet homme
vous appelle son associé ?

translation.en: He handles extortion for three powerful crime syndicates.
translation.fr:
Il fait du racket
pour trois puissantes triades.

translation.en: And when I began construction on The Pearl, Botha came to me.
translation.fr:
Quand j'ai lancé le chantier,
il est venu me trouver.

translation.en: He said that if I didn't pay him, he'll cripple my labor force
translation.fr:
Il a menacé de s'en prendre
aux travailleurs

translation.en: and keep me from ever completing this place.
But what he didn't know was that
I hid tracking software inside my wire transfer.
translation.fr:
que j'ai ajouté un mouchard
à mon virement.

translation.en: As Botha laundered my payments through their offshore accounts,
translation.fr:
Pendant qu'il blanchissait
mes paiements à l'étranger,

translation.en: I was able to trace every transaction,
Botha would never be able to extort money from me again.
translation.fr:
pour que Botha ne puisse plus jamais
m'extorquer.

translation.en: But when the syndicates found out that they were compromised,
they threatened to destroy Botha if he didn't clean up his mess.
translation.fr:
elles ont sommé Botha
de réparer son erreur.

translation.en: If he kills me, the copies I've made will be sent to the authorities.
translation.fr:
S'il me tue, les copies que j'ai faites
iront aux autorités,

translation.en: But if he gets his hands on this, the original,
translation.fr: mais s'il se procure ceci, l'original,

translation.en: he can reverse engineer my tracking software
translation.fr: il sera à même de renverser le pistage

translation.en: and hide the identities before anyone's the wiser.
translation.fr:
et d'effacer les noms
avant toute action possible.

translation.en: So, he lit this entire building on fire
knowing that you would take the most valuable thing in this world to you and run.
translation.fr:
sachant que vous prendriez
votre bien le plus précieux.

translation.en: -And his plan worked. -Not yet, it hasn't.
translation.fr: Son plan a marché. Pas encore.

translation.en: We're gonna give Botha what he came here for.
translation.fr: On va lui donner ce qu'il cherche.

translation.en: As soon as he has the drive, he'll kill us both.
translation.fr: Dès qu'il l'aura, il nous tuera.

translation.en: And her life is what matters to me, not mine.
translation.fr:
et seule sa vie compte,
pas la mienne.

translation.en: Now, I'm taking that drive to the roof.
You could either be attached to it or not.
I knew you'd find a way.

translation.fr: et j'ai un truc à toi.
et Zhao avec. Non, ma fille d'abord.

translation.en: -I can't let you do this. -Hey, what are you doing?
translation.fr: Vous ne ferez pas ça. C'est pas ça, le plan.

translation.en: -This is not in the plan. -Turn around.
He's got my daughter. Please, don't do this to me.

translation.fr:
Sans moi vivant,
vous n'aurez rien.

translation.en: -A parachute or you get nothing! -Give him your parachute.
translation.fr:
Sans moi vivant,
vous n'aurez rien. Donne-lui le tien.

translation.en: [Inspector Wu] It looks like you were right.
We've got armed suspects up ahead.
Stay down, don't leave the car.
Thanks. You almost had me convinced out there.
translation.fr:
Merci, j'ai failli marcher,
tout à l'heure.

translation.en: You shoot me, I drop this
translation.fr: Tu me tires dessus, je lâche ça
Baisse ton arme ! Non, pas ça.

translation.en: But there's one thing you should know first.
translation.fr: mais tu dois savoir une chose.

translation.en: [sighs heavily] I got you. I got you. I got you.
I don't know, she had it on her.
translation.fr: Je sais pas, elle l'avait sur elle.

translation.en: It looks like it controls the building.
Hey, let's wait for someone who knows what they're doing.
My husband and daughter are in that building, it's on fire right now. I'm not gonna wait another damn second.
translation.fr:
Mon mari et ma fille sont à l'intérieur,
pas question d'attendre.

translation.en: Come here. Stay down, stay low. I'm gonna find us a way out of here.
translation.fr: Viens là. Bouge pas, je vais nous sortir d'ici.

translation.en: I'm trying to bring the fire systems back online.
I got you. Look at me. Look at me.
Daddy loves you. Daddy loves you.
How the hell did you do that?
I rebooted the control systems for the entire building.
translation.fr:
J'ai rebooté
le système de contrôle de l'immeuble.

translation.en: I turned it off and on again.
What are you gonna do now?
You okay? You okay? Are you hurt?

translation.fr:
- Non, on n'a rien.
- Je vais bien, papa.

translation.en: You've got quite a family there.
